message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product for $175. This is a limited-time offer, so I hope you'll consider it carefully.
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I'm interested in the product, but $175 is a bit more than I'm willing to spend right now.  Would you be open to $140?
I appreciate your interest in the product, Bob. After considering your offer, I'm unable to match it. However, I would like to extend a special deal to you. How about $160 for the product?

Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but $160 is still a bit too high for me.  I'm sticking with my previous offer of $140. If you're not able to accept that, I'll have to look at other options.
Understood, Bob. I respect your decision. Let me see if I can adjust the price further. I am willing to sell the product for $155.
